code:
---
config:
  theme: redux
---
flowchart TD
    A1[Education_LMS_Portal] --> A[Education_GradeSync]
    A --> B[Education_StudentDB]
    B -- Memory read successful --> C[Education_GradeSync]
    B -- Memory access error --> D[Education_LMS_Portal]
    D --> E[Education_ContentCDN]
    E --> F[Education_ContentCDN]
    C --> G{Education_LMS_Portal}
    G -- Yes --> H[Education_ClassroomService]
    G -- No --> I[Education_LMS_Portal]
    I --> J[Education_StudentDB]
    J --> K[Education_ContentCDN]
    K --> A
    H --> L{Education_StudentDB}
    L -- Immediate, Implied, Accumulator --> M[Education_GradeSync]
    L -- Zero Page, Indexed, Absolute --> N[Education_ContentCDN]
    L -- Indirect, Relative --> O[Education_ClassroomService]
    M --> P[Education_ClassroomService]
    N --> Q[Education_StudentDB]
    O --> R[Education_GradeSync]
    P --> S[Education_LMS_Portal]
    Q --> S
    R --> S
    S --> T{Education_LMS_Portal}
    T -- "Arithmetic/Logical - e.g., ADC, AND" --> U[Education_StudentDB]
    T -- "Load/Store - e.g., LDA, STA" --> V[Education_ContentCDN]
    T -- "Branch - e.g., BEQ, JMP" --> W[Education_ContentCDN]
    T -- "Stack - e.g., PHA, RTS" --> X[Education_ContentCDN]
    T -- "System - e.g., BRK, RTI" --> Y[Education_StudentDB]
    U --> Z[Education_ContentCDN]
    V --> Z
    W --> AA[Education_StudentDB]
    X --> Z
    Y --> AB[Education_ClassroomService]
    AA -- Met --> AC[Education_GradeSync]
    AA --  Not mett --> AD[Education_ContentCDN]
    AC --> Z
    AD --> Z
    AB -- Interrupt triggered --> AE[Education_GradeSync]
    AB -- Return from interrupt --> AF[Education_GradeSync]
    AE --> AG[Education_GradeSync]
    AF --> Z
    Z --> AH[Education_GradeSync]
    AG --> AH
    AH --> AI{Education_StudentDB}
    AI -- "NMI pending - e.g., PPU VBlank" --> AJ[Education_StudentDB]
    AI -- "IRQ pending - e.g., mapper, APU" --> AK[Education_GradeSync]
    AI -- No interrupts --> AL[Education_StudentDB]
    AJ --> AM[Education_GradeSync]
    AK --> AN[Education_GradeSync]
    AL --> AO[Education_ClassroomService]
    AM --> AO
    AN --> AO
    AO --> AP{Education_LMS_Portal}
    AP -- Yes --> AQ[Education_GradeSync]
    AQ --> AR[Education_ClassroomService]
    AR --> AS[Education_ContentCDN]
    AS --> AT[Education_GradeSync]
    AT --> AU[Education_ContentCDN]
    AP -- No --> AU
    AU --> A
    style AI stroke:#000000
repo_description: A Nintendo Entertainment System Emulator written in Swift
